alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard, east central Orange and southeastern Volusia Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Christmas, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Christmas, Mims, Titusville Airport and Bithlo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
